languages.text: После суда над префектом Вультур и маршалом Страксом Вольный Торговец приказал{mf||а} Арбитес найти себе нового командира и забыть о династии фон Валанциус. Назначенный спустя годы маршал был настолько испуган судьбой своего предшественника, что не смел сказать и слова против решений династии. Со временем Арбитес Простора выродились из грозы любого преступника в очередной клан блюстителей порядка и затерялись среди тысячи себе подобных.

After the trial of Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the Rogue Trader ordered the Arbites to find a new commander and forget about House von Valancius. The Marshal appointed years later was so frightened by the fate of their predecessor that they never dared say a word against the dynasty's decisions. Once every criminal's worst nightmare, the Arbites of the Expanse gradually declined into just another law-enforcement clan, indistinguishable from the many thousands like it.
languages.original_text: После суда над префектом Вультур и маршалом Страксом Вольный Торговец приказал{mf||а} Арбитес найти себе нового командира и забыть о династии фон Валанциус. traits.locale_text: After the trial of Preect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the Rogue Trader ordered the Arbites to find a new commander and forget about House von Valancius. The marshal appointed years later was so frightened by the fate of his predecessor that he never dared say a word against the dynasty's decisions. Once every criminal's worst nightmare, the Arbites gradually declined into just another law-enforcement clan, indistinguishable from thousands like it.

languages.text: Nach dem Prozess von Präfektin Vultur und Marschall Strachs befahl {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} den Arbites, einen neuen Commander zu finden und das Haus Valancius zu vergessen. Der Jahre später ernannte Marschall war wegen des Schicksals seines Vorgängers so verängstigt, dass er es niemals wagte, auch nur ein Wort gegen die Entscheidungen der Dynastie zu sagen. Einst der schlimmste Albtraum aller Verbrecher, wurden die Arbites der Ausdehnung zu einem ganz normalen Clan von Gesetzeshütern, nicht zu unterschieden von den Tausenden anderen.
languages.original_text: After the trial of Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the Rogue Trader ordered the Arbites to find a new commander and forget about House von Valancius. The Marshal appointed years later was so frightened by the fate of their predecessor that they never dared say a word against the dynasty's decisions. Once every criminal's worst nightmare, the Arbites of the Expanse gradually declined into just another law-enforcement clan, indistinguishable from the many thousands like it.

traits.locale_text: Nach dem Prozess von Präfektin Vultur und Marschall Strachs befahl {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} den Arbites, einen neuen Commander zu finden und das Haus Valancius zu vergessen. Der Jahre später ernannte Marschall war wegen des Schicksals seines Vorgängers so verängstigt, dass er es niemals wagte, auch nur ein Wort gegen die Entscheidungen der Dynastie zu sagen. Einst der schlimmste Albtraum aller Verbrecher, wurden die Arbites der Ausdehnung zu einem ganz normalen Clan von Gesetzeshütern, nicht zu unterschieden von den Tausenden anderen.

languages.text: Après le procès de la préfète Vultur et du maréchal Strachs, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ordonna à l'Arbites de se trouver un nouveau commandant et d'oublier la maison von Valancius. Terrifié par le sort de son prédécesseur, le nouveau maréchal, nommé bien des années plus tard, n'osa jamais s'opposer aux décisions de la dynastie. Autrefois le pire cauchemar des criminels de tous bords, l'Arbites des Étendues s'est peu à peu transformé en une autorité de maintien de l'ordre comme les autres, indiscernable de ses milliers d'homologues.
languages.original_text: After the trial of Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the Rogue Trader ordered the Arbites to find a new commander and forget about House von Valancius. The Marshal appointed years later was so frightened by the fate of their predecessor that they never dared say a word against the dynasty's decisions. Once every criminal's worst nightmare, the Arbites of the Expanse gradually declined into just another law-enforcement clan, indistinguishable from the many thousands like it.

traits.locale_text: Après le procès de la préfète Vultur et du maréchal Strachs, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ordonna à l'Arbites de se trouver un nouveau commandant et d'oublier la maison von Valancius. Terrifié par le sort de son prédécesseur, le nouveau maréchal, nommé bien des années plus tard, n'osa jamais s'opposer aux décisions de la dynastie. Autrefois le pire cauchemar des criminels de tous bords, l'Arbites des Étendues s'est peu à peu transformé en une autorité de maintien de l'ordre comme les autres, indiscernable de ses milliers d'homologues.

languages.text: 针对沃尔图尔行政官与斯塔克斯元帅的审判结束后，行商浪人命令法务部推选一位新的领袖，禁止法务部干涉冯·瓦兰修斯王朝一切事务。多年后，新上任的元帅被前任元帅的结局吓坏了，再也不敢质疑冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的一切决定。科罗努斯扩区法务部曾是众多罪犯最可怕的噩梦，但在这样的大环境下，它渐渐沦为了随处可见的执法者氏族，最终与成千上万的类似氏族别无二致。
languages.original_text: After the trial of Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the Rogue Trader ordered the Arbites to find a new commander and forget about House von Valancius. The Marshal appointed years later was so frightened by the fate of their predecessor that they never dared say a word against the dynasty's decisions. Once every criminal's worst nightmare, the Arbites of the Expanse gradually declined into just another law-enforcement clan, indistinguishable from the many thousands like it.

traits.locale_text: 针对沃尔图尔行政官与斯塔克斯元帅的审判结束后，行商浪人命令法务部推选一位新的领袖，禁止法务部干涉冯·瓦兰修斯王朝一切事务。多年后，新上任的元帅被前任元帅的结局吓坏了，再也不敢质疑冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的一切决定。科罗努斯扩区法务部曾是众多罪犯最可怕的噩梦，但在这样的大环境下，它渐渐沦为了随处可见的执法者氏族，最终与成千上万的类似氏族别无二致。
针对沃尔图尔行政官与斯塔克斯元帅的审判结束后，行商浪人命令法务部推选一位新的领袖，禁止法务部干涉冯·瓦兰修斯王朝一切事务。多年后，新上任的元帅被前任元帅的结局吓坏了，再也不敢质疑冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的一切决定。帝国法务部曾是所有罪犯最可怕的噩梦，但在这样的大环境下，它渐渐沦为了随处可见的执法者氏族，最终与成千上万的类似氏族别无二致。

languages.text: Tras el juicio de la prefecta Vultur y el Mariscal Strachs, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ordenó al Arbites encontrar un nuevo comandante y olvidar a la casa von Valancius. El Mariscal nombrado años después estaba tan horrorizado por el destino de su predecesor que jamás osó decir una sola palabra en contra de las decisiones de la dinastía. Los Arbitrator de la Extensión, antes la peor pesadilla de todo delincuente, acabaron convirtiéndose en un mero clan de agentes de la ley, uno más de miles.
languages.original_text: After the trial of Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the Rogue Trader ordered the Arbites to find a new commander and forget about House von Valancius. The Marshal appointed years later was so frightened by the fate of their predecessor that they never dared say a word against the dynasty's decisions. Once every criminal's worst nightmare, the Arbites of the Expanse gradually declined into just another law-enforcement clan, indistinguishable from the many thousands like it.

traits.locale_text: Tras el juicio de la prefecta Vultur y el Mariscal Strachs, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ordenó al Arbites encontrar un nuevo comandante y olvidar a la casa von Valancius. El Mariscal nombrado años después estaba tan horrorizado por el destino de su predecesor que jamás osó decir una sola palabra en contra de las decisiones de la dinastía. Los Arbitrator de la Extensión, antes la peor pesadilla de todo delincuente, acabaron convirtiéndose en un mero clan de agentes de la ley, uno más de miles.

languages.text: ヴァルター総監とストラッチス将帥の裁判の後、ローグトレーダーは高等裁定局に新しい司令官を見つけるよう命じ、フォン・ヴァランシウス家のことは忘れるようにと言った。数年後に任命された将帥は、前任者の運命に恐怖し、王朝の決定に対して一言でも反論することは決してしなかった。かつてはすべての犯罪者にとって最悪の悪夢だったエクスパンスの高等裁定局は、次第に他の多くの法執行部隊と区別がつかないただの一つの法執行組織へと衰退していった。
languages.original_text: After the trial of Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the Rogue Trader ordered the Arbites to find a new commander and forget about House von Valancius. The Marshal appointed years later was so frightened by the fate of their predecessor that they never dared say a word against the dynasty's decisions. Once every criminal's worst nightmare, the Arbites of the Expanse gradually declined into just another law-enforcement clan, indistinguishable from the many thousands like it.

traits.locale_text: ヴァルター総監とストラッチス将帥の裁判の後、ローグトレーダーは高等裁定局に新しい司令官を見つけるよう命じ、フォン・ヴァランシウス家のことは忘れるようにと言った。数年後に任命された将帥は、前任者の運命に恐怖し、王朝の決定に対して一言でも反論することは決してしなかった。かつてはすべての犯罪者にとって最悪の悪夢だったエクスパンスの高等裁定局は、次第に他の多くの法執行部隊と区別がつかないただの一つの法執行組織へと衰退していった。

languages.text: Prefekt Vultur ve Miralay Strachs'ın duruşmasının ardından Hür Tacir, Yargıcılara yeni bir komutan bulmalarını ve von Valancius Hanesi'ni akıllarından silmelerini emretti. Yıllar sonra atanan Miralay, selefinin acı kaderinden öylesine korkmuştu ki hanenin aldığı kararlar hakkında tek bir kelime etmeye bile cüret edemedi. Bir zamanlar her suçlunun kâbusu olan Enginlik'in Arbites'i, gitgide kanunun yükümlülüklerini yerine getiren binlerce benzer klandan birine dönüşerek eski görkemini yitirdi.
languages.original_text: After the trial of Prefect Vultur and Marshal Strachs, the Rogue Trader ordered the Arbites to find a new commander and forget about House von Valancius. The Marshal appointed years later was so frightened by the fate of their predecessor that they never dared say a word against the dynasty's decisions. Once every criminal's worst nightmare, the Arbites of the Expanse gradually declined into just another law-enforcement clan, indistinguishable from the many thousands like it.

traits.locale_text: Prefekt Vultur ve Miralay Strachs'ın duruşmasının ardından Hür Tacir, Yargıcılara yeni bir komutan bulmalarını ve von Valancius Hanesi'ni akıllarından silmelerini emretti. Yıllar sonra atanan Miralay, selefinin acı kaderinden öylesine korkmuştu ki hanenin aldığı kararlar hakkında tek bir kelime etmeye bile cüret edemedi. Bir zamanlar her suçlunun kâbusu olan Enginlik'in Arbites'i, gitgide kanunun yükümlülüklerini yerine getiren binlerce benzer klandan birine dönüşerek eski görkemini yitirdi.
